ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD image sensor. Horizontal resolution: 420 TVL. NTSC System
Built-in 4-9mm varifocal lens. Minimum illumination: 0.1 Lux
Lens allow 355 degree horizontal and 45 degree vertical rotation for adjustment by manual
Humanization three-dimensional bracket. Weatherproof housing designed for outdoor and indoor application
Auto backlight compensation, auto gain control and auto white balance
